  opacity: 0;
  transition: opacity .5s;
  
  z-index: 1;
}

img {
  width: 100%;
  height: auto;
}

@media (hover: none) { 
  .paper-title {
    opacity: 1;
    background: none;
  }

    filter: blur(0px);
